lead_paragraph: Judge Dennis Porter of Cook County has found a Chicago police detective not guilty of involuntary manslaughter in the shooting death of an unarmed woman.

headline.main: Illinois: Chicago Police Detective Acquitted in Killing
headline.print_headline: Illinois: Chicago Police Detective Acquitted In Killing

snippet: Judge Dennis Porter of Cook County has found a Chicago police detective not guilty of involuntary manslaughter in the shooting death of an unarmed woman.
